title: OMOP Clinical Data Infrastructure
content: Core OMOP CDM standardization and EHR integration platform. Seamlessly transform data from Epic, Cerner, and ancillary systems into OMOP format. Enables interoperable AI deployment, eliminates vendor lock-in, and accelerates multi-institutional research collaboration.

title: Secure AI Sandboxing & Datathons
content: Safe research enclaves for clinical AI experimentation. HIPAA/FedRAMP compliant sandboxes with native MCP support, Claude Code, and Gemini integration. Host multi-institutional datathons, enable self-service AI deployment, and maintain governance controls.

title: AI Agent Infrastructure
content: Enterprise-grade infrastructure for powering intelligent healthcare agents. Real-time orchestration, multi-model deployment, and agent-to-agent communication. Built for clinical decision support, automated workflows, and next-generation AI applications.

title: Enterprise Integration & Security
content: Comprehensive Epic, Cerner, and ancillary system connectivity. HL7 FHIR, proprietary APIs, Apache Kafka streaming, and complete audit logging. Multi-cloud ready (Azure/AWS/GCP) with SOC 2 Type II and FedRAMP authorization.
